author: Lalita Clozel
title: Arrival of Final Bank Regulator Could Speed Up Easing of Rules
text:
WASHINGTON—Banks can expect to see significant further relief from postcrisis rules in 2018 after the final Trump-appointed leader is seated at the nation’s banking regulators later this spring.
Jelena McWilliams, the top lawyer at Cincinnati-based Fifth Third Bancorp, is set to succeed Obama-appointee Martin Gruenberg as head of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. as early as April.
When...
